name: Shred Quest
description:
After a night of debauchery, Tommy has found himself in a very strange place. Help Tommy progress by learning and playing chords to progress this metroidvania.

Made for the Wanna x Yam Game Jam 2022

Important Note - Web version is a little jittery. For a better experience, download and play the game. Controller usage is also a benefit.

Controls

  • Up - W key / D-Pad Up
  • Down - S key / D-Pad Down
  • Left - A key / D-Pad Left
  • Right - D key / D-Pad Right
  • Jump - Spacebar / PS Cross / Xbox A
  • Attack - K key / PS Square / Xbox X
  • Pause - Escape / PS Options / Xbox Start
  • Toggle Map - M key / PS L1 / Xbox L
  • Powerup 1 - I key / PS Triangle / Xbox Y
  • Powerup 2 - O key / PS Circle / Xbox B
  • Powerup 3 - P key / PS R1 / Xbox R
  • UI Accept - Enter / PS Cross / Xbox A
  • UI Back - Escape / PS Circle / Xbox B

External Assets

  • https://opengameart.org/content/the-plague
  • https://opengameart.org/content/the-ritual
  • https://opengameart.org/content/haunting-piano
